attributes.action: Replace ALL one way roads with dual way roads unless not physically possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have you been stuck in a one way system? How many times have you been more than aware than being able to travel in the opposite direction down a one way street would save a massive detour? It appears that the local councils ideas of traffic management are failing the general public. One of the greatest failures is the 'one way system'. It is good in theory and sometimes good in practice but the local councils have massively over extended those theories and put way too many of them WRONGLY into practice. If the road is wide and safe enough for a lane in either direction then it should be.
